dict.acceptation: 你自己；（用以加强语气）亲自；你的正常或健康的情况；

sent.orig: Understand yourself, conquer yourself, change yourself, and then you can change others.
sent.trans: 认识自己，降伏自己，改变自己，才能改变别人。

sent.orig: Make peace with yourself. Forgive yourself for anything you regret. Offer yourself the respect you deserve!
sent.trans: 那就是与你自己和解，为一切让你感到遗憾的事情原谅你自己，给你自己以应有的尊重！

sent.orig: Go all out to do something kind and compassionate for yourself. Respect yourself, forgive yourself.
sent.trans: 尽一切可能做些对自己友善和自我同情的事情吧，尊重自己，也原谅自己。

sent.orig: Do it yourself.Depend on yourself.Rely on yourself.
sent.trans: 自己做，依靠你自己，相信你自己。

sent.orig: The Master said Inspire yourself with Poetry; establish yourself on The Rituals; perfect yourself with Music.
sent.trans: 孔子说，“修行以《诗》起步，以礼仪来立身，以音乐来完成。”
